app.template.name: Health Waiver
app.template.description: Send waiver forms to customers & track who submitted them.
app.template.initial.title: Health Waiver
app.template.initial.description: Please take a minute to fill in the following info.
app.template.initial.fields.email.label: Email
app.template.initial.fields.phone.label: Phone Number
app.template.initial.fields.radio.label: Do you have a doctor’s permit to participate in physical activities?
app.template.initial.fields.paragraph.la: Please specify anything we should know about:
app.template.initial.fields.checkbox.lab: I agree to the terms & conditions
app.template.initial.successMessage: Thanks for submitting your waiver form. We’ll be in touch soon.
app.metadata.badge.name: Waiver
app.metadata.badge.tooltip: This is your business’ waiver form.
app.metadata.disclaimer.description: Note: A tag with the waiver status will be shown for all new contacts.
app.state.disabled.tooltip: Your business already has a waiver form.
app.state.delete.title: Remove your business’ waiver form?
app.state.delete.description: Waiver info will be deleted from your contacts. You will still be able to view existing submissions in Removed Forms.
app.saveForm.requiredEmailWarning: Form wasn’t saved. To save a waiver form, an Email or a Phone field must be set as “required”.
app.deleteFieldModal.title: This field can’t be deleted
app.deleteFieldModal.description: A waiver form must have either an Email or a Phone field, and at least one of them needs to be set as “required”.
